card_name: NTUC Link Credit Card by Trust

key_features: No Foreign Transaction Fees (not even the 1% Visa charge)
No Annual Fees and Cash Advance fees
Up to 21% savings on groceries and food at FairPrice Group merchants
Up to 20% petrol savings at Caltex and Esso
Track rewards and get repayment reminders with the Trust app
overseas_spending: Enjoy zero foreign transaction fees when spending overseas
bill_payment: Track rewards and get repayment reminders with the Trust app
Up to 21% savings on groceries and food at FairPrice Group merchants
Up to 20% petrol savings at Caltex and Esso
petrol: Up to 20% petrol savings at Caltex and Esso
cash_back: Up to 20% petrol savings at Caltex and Esso
Up to 21% savings on groceries and food at FairPrice Group merchants
rewards: Up to 21% in Linkpoints which can be used at FairPrice supermarkets, Unity pharmacies, Kopitiam outlets, and a wide variety of Link Partners such as Caltex, Cathay Pacific, and more
entertainment: Up to 20% petrol savings at Caltex and Esso

fees.annual_interest_rate: Interest on purchases â€“ Effective Interest Rate (EIR): 26.9% per annum based on a 365-day year (minimum). If payment is not made in full by the due date, interest will be calculated daily at 0.074% from the respective transaction dates for all transactions until the date the payment is received.
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: (a) The greater of either S$50 or 1% of principal, plus (b) interest, finance fees and charges, and (c) any overlimit amount and past due amount.
